featured.text: Since its introduction in the early 20th century, the headgear has saved countless lives and is considered the number one safety tool for construction workers.
The headgear was later made mandatory at construction sites in major construction projects, such as the Hoover Dam in 1931 and the Golden Gate Bridge in 1933.

definition.zh_def: 頭部裝置，通常用於牙齒矯正或支撐頭部的設備。
definition.en_def: A device worn on the head, often used for dental correction or to support the head.
definition.example: She wore her headgear every night to help straighten her teeth.
